Rey, as well as a rogue stormtrooper and two smugglers, are thrown into the middle of a battle between the Resistance and the daunting legions of the First Order.
movie.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 47 wins & 104 nominations.

movie.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
movie.actors: Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Jake Lloyd
movie.plot: The evil Trade Federation, led by Nute Gunray is planning to take over the peaceful world of Naboo. Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi are sent to confront the leaders. But not everything goes to plan. The two Jedi escape, and along with their new Gungan friend, Jar Jar Binks head to Naboo to warn Queen Amidala, but droids have already started to capture Naboo and the Queen is not safe there. Eventually, they land on Tatooine, where they become friends with a young boy known as Anakin Skywalker. Qui-Gon is curious about the boy, and sees a bright future for him. The group must now find a way of getting to Coruscant and to finally solve this trade dispute, but there is someone else hiding in the shadows. Are the Sith really extinct? Is the Queen really who she says she is? And what's so special about this young boy?
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 24 wins & 60 nominations.

movie.plot: As the Clone Wars sweep through the galaxy, the heroic Jedi Knights struggle to maintain order and restore peace. More and more systems are falling prey to the forces of the dark side as the Galactic Republic slips further and further under the sway of the Separatists and their never-ending droid army. Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan learner Ahsoka Tano find themselves on a mission with far-reaching consequences, one that brings them face-to-face with crime lord Jabba the Hutt. But Count Dooku and his sinister agents, including the nefarious Asajj Ventress, will stop at nothing to ensure that Anakin and Ahsoka fail at their quest. Meanwhile, on the front lines of the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Master Yoda lead the massive clone army in a valiant effort to resist the forces of the dark side ...

movie.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars

movie.plot: Immediately after the events of Star Wars-Episode II: Attack of the Clones, the Clone Wars continue. The Separatists launch masses of Battle Droids while the Republic has an entire arsenal of Clone Troopers to blow them away. Obi-Wan Kenobi and his apprentice Anakin Skywalker are also participating in the fights against Count Dooku and his defiant separatists. Jedi Masters Yoda and Mace Windu, take part in the battle as well. While down on Coruscant, Padme Amidala, Chancellor Palpatine, C-3PO and R2-D2 hope nothing but good for our heroes. Will the Republic emerge triumphant? Will Dooku and his separatists be brought to their knees? And will Anakin truly bring balance to the Force, or will he bring absolutely tyranny?

While we are waiting we get a look at the everyday life of a Wookiee family. We also pay a visit to the Cantina and meet all the monsters again.

movie.title: The Making of 'Star Wars'
movie.actors: William Conrad, Anthony Daniels, George Lucas, Mark Hamill
movie.plot: Ever wonder how they ever managed to make a movie like Star Wars? Well, bickering droid duo C-3PO and R2-D2 host this tour of the mind of creator George Lucas and what inspired him to make the movie. Even interviewed are the cast and crew, even features scenes of when C-3PO, R2-D2, and Darth Vader planted their footprints (or in R2's case, tread-prints) into cement. Also discussed is Star Wars mania, how fans loved the movie, collected the merchandise and danced the disco music. Also shown are behind-the-scenes looks at the movie, as well as how difficult each effect was in doing since they didn't have the convenience of computer animation back then.

movie.title: Super Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
movie.plot: The Empire is rebuilding the Death Star and planning a big attack on the Rebels. Meanwhile back on Tatooine, the evil Jabba the Hutt is causing trouble. He also has in his possession Han Solo, who's been frozen in carbonite in the last adventure, so in a land speeder, Luke Skywalker, Chewbacca and Princess Leia rush to Jabba's palace. After a treacherous ride over cliffs and rocks, you arrive. Leia is dressed as bounty hunter Boush. You rescue Han Solo, then you must defeat Bib Fortuna, survive the Rancor pit, treacherous rides on Skiffs, and send Jabba the Hutt to an early grave! Soon after you all travel to the exotic moon of Endor, while Lando Calrissian leads Rebel pilots into a full scale attack on the Empire. Luke and Leia must survive a fast and furious Speeder rides, avoiding trees. Then they meet Wicket and the rest of the Ewoks who help rid the Ewok Village of Imperial Troops. Luke, meanwhile, heads into the forest and allows himself to be captured and taken onboard the Death Star where he must engage into a lightsaber battle with Darth Vader, and even the Emperor himself! And then, Lando flies the Millennium Falcon into the Death Star and destroys the breaking point, which is the good news because the Death Star will now simultaneously combust. The bad news: you've got to zoom out of there at the speed of light, avoiding walls and small ceilings! If you are successful, the Death Star will once and for all be blown away into the heavens, and the Rebels will live happily ever after.

movie.title: Super Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
movie.actors: C. Andrew Nelson
movie.plot: The fifth episode of the Star Wars trilogy is now on your Super Nintendo! It opens on the ice world of Hoth, where Luke Skywalker and his band of rebels have established a base. They chose this particular planet because they figured the Imperial forces wouldn't sink to freezing their hinies off looking for them. One afternoon as Luke is traveling on his TaunTaun in the snow, he notices a meteorite that strikes the ground. It's an Imperial Probot! So he must battle Wampas, probe droids, and other dangerous Hoth creatures but beware! The Wampas can breathe on you and turn you to ice! Dodge the snow covered valleys and dangerous caves, then climb aboard the snow speeder and take out AT-AT Imperial Walkers and AT-ST two legged ones. And then, while Han Solo, Princess Leia, Chewbacca and C-3PO fly off in the Millennium Falcon, Luke and R2-D2 head for the swamp planet of Dagobah to learn from Yoda, a wise old Jedi Master. Meanwhile the Falcon runs into Imperial problems, so they decide to travel to Cloud City on the remote planet of Bespin. But the Empire beats them to it, C-3PO winds up in the Ugnaught junk room, and what is more, Han Solo has been encased in carbonite! Sensing his friends' troubles, Luke races to Cloud City in his X-Wing, but watch out for Cloud Cars because they don't cotton to visitors! movie.title: Bob Wilkins Star Wars
movie.plot: During the 1970s, when Bob Wilkins Creature Features aired, it was taped in studio on 2" magnetic tape. Due to the high cost of these tapes, most all of Bob's shows when taped over. While only a few complete shows survived, Bob did save a fair amount of segments, interviews, movie trailers and clips. This DVD is made from a treasure trove of Creature Features material. Most not seen in years. Interviews with Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Gary Kurtz, Anthony Daniels, David Prowse, plus extras. Shortly after Star Wars premiere in 1977, Bob Wilkins sat down with members of the original cast for a rare set of interviews. Filmed with 16mm movie film, these interviews have been professionally transferred and presented in high quality video and sound. In addition to the star interviews, there is a rare 1978 signing event with Anthony Daniels and Bob Wilkins interviewing Darth Vader in front of a San Francisco movie theater. 62 minutes 2015. From the Garfield Lane Productions web site.
